title: PRÆY
description: PRÆY is the personal site for Tapiwanashe Manhombo - a filmmaker and writer. Tapiwa's site is meant to showcase the work she has done, be a place for her writing, as well as help promote her book. It is designed to better reflect her.

title: The Language Hub
description: The Language Hub is a central place for your language learning needs. Getting you to what you need quickly and easily

title: Monoqo Design
description: The site for a branding company. This was built to client's specifications. They came with a design, I brought it to life.

title: One Thing
description: This app is a way to help you focus on one task at a time. Thereby reducing the stress of looking at a long list of tasks.

title: Chouette Hosting
description: The frontend for a web hosting company. The backend is still to be decided on.
